GK19bahcar6u:7: nīteṣu tīrthasthānāni saha janahṛdayaiḥ kīkaseṣu, kalpitaśokaśalye sudhānicayacite citācaityacihne, vanāya visarjite mahāvijiti rājagajendre,
GK19bahcar6u:8: krameṇa ca mandaṣvākrandeṣu, viralībhavatsu ca vilāpeṣu, viśrāmyatyaśruṇi,
GK19bahcar6u:10: hṛdayeṣu, gaṇanīyeṣu nṛpaguṇeṣu, pradeśavṛttitāmāśrayati śoke, kṛteṣu
GK19bahcar6u:11_0: kaviruditakeṣu, jāte ca svapnāvaśeṣadarśane hṛdayāvaśeṣāvasthāne citrāvaśeṣākṛtau kāvyāvaśeṣanāmni naranāthe, devo harṣaḥ
GK19bahcar6u:18: sa mandamabravīt--”deva! yathādiśasi dvāri' iti śrutvā ca
GK19bahcar6u:19: sodaryasnehanihitaniratiśayamanyumṛdūkṛtamanāḥ kathamapi na vavāma bāṣpavāripravāhotpīḍena saha jīvitam /
GK19bahcar6u:20_0: anantaraṃ ca dvārapālapramuktena prathamapraviṣṭena parijanenevākrandena kathyamānam, dūradrutāgamanamuṣitabāhulyena vicchinnacchatradhāreṇa
GK19bahcar6u:25: hutamāṃsairatikṛśairavayavairāvedyamānaduḥkhabhāram, avagatacūḍāmaṇini malinākulakuntale śekharaśūnye śirasi śūcamārūḍhāṃ mūrtimatīmiva dadhānam,
GK19bahcar6u:31_0: mahābhūbhṛdvinipātavihvalaniravalaṃbanam, divasamiva tejaḥpatipatanaparimlānaśriyaṃ śyāmībhūtam, nandanamiva bhagnakalpapādapaṃ
GK19bahcar6u:31_1: vicchāyam, digbhāgamiva proṣitadikkuñjaraśūnyam, girimiva guruvajrapātadāritaṃ prakampamānam, krītamiva kraśimnā, kiṅkarīkṛtamiva
GK19bahcar6u:33: andhīkṛtamivādhinā, mūkīkṛtamiva maunena, piṣṭamiva piḍayā, svinnamiva
GK19bahcar6u:34: saṃtāpena, uccitamiva cintayā, viluptamiva vilāpena, dhṛtamiva vairāgyeṇa,
GK19bahcar6u:37: agamyena gurugirām, aśakyena śāstraśaktīnām, apathena prajñāprayatnānām,
GK19bahcar6u:38: agocareṇa suhṛdanurodhānām, aviṣayeṇa viṣayopabhogānām, abhūmibhūtena kālakramopacayānāṃ śokena kavalīkṛtaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaramapaśyat /
GK19bahcar6u:39: āvegodgatakṛtsnasnehotkalikākalāpotkṣipya māṇakāya iva ca paravaśaḥ samudagāt /
GK19bahcar6u:40_0: atha taṃ dūrādeva dṛṣṭvā devo rājyavardhanaścirakālakalitaṃ bāṣpāvegaṃ mumukṣuḥ sudūraprasāritena saṃkalpayanniva sarvaduḥkhāni
GK19bahcar6u:40_1: dīrgheṇa dardaṇḍadvayena gṛhītvā kaṇṭhe muktakaṇṭhaṃ punaḥ patitakṣaume kṣāme vakṣasi punaḥ, kaṇṭhe punaḥ skandhabhāge punaḥ
GK19bahcar6u:40_2: kapolodare nidhāya tathā tathā ruroda yathā saṃbandhanānīvodapāṭyanta hṛdayāni /
GK19bahcar6u:41: aśrusrotaḥśirā ivāmucyata locaneṣu lokenāsmṛtanṛpatinā rājavallabhenāpi pratiśabdakanibhena nirbharamivārudyata /
GK19bahcar6u:42: sucirācca kathaṃ kathamapi nirvṛṣṭanayanajalaḥ parjanya iva śaradi svayamevopaśaśāma /
GK19bahcar6u:43_0: upaviṣṭaśca parijanopanītena toyena taratkaranakhamayūkhapuñjatayā mahājalaplavajāyamānaphenalekhamiva punaḥ punaḥ pramṛṣṭamapi
GK19bahcar6u:46_0: tasyāṃ ca sthitvā vibhūṣaṃ vitrastavyastakuntalaṃ maulimanādarānniṣpīḍya sāvaśeṣamanyusphuritena jijīviṣateva jaladhautasubhagamātmānamapi
GK19bahcar6u:46_1: cucumbiṣatevādhareṇa kṣālitasya cakṣuṣaḥ śvetimnā ca śāradaśaśikaravikasitaviśadakumudavanadalāvalibalivikṣepairiva digdevatārcanakarma
GK19bahcar6u:49: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā dūyamānasamagrajanmānaṃ samasphuṭadivāsya sahasradhā hṛdayam
GK19bahcar6u:51: lokasya tu narapatimaraṇadivasādapi dāruṇataraḥ sa babhūva divasaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:52: sarvasminneva ca nagare na kenacidapāci na kenacidasnāyi nābhoji /
GK19bahcar6u:57: savidhavirahavyādhividhuradhūbādhyamānaṃ babandha bandhāviva vibuddhabandhūkabhāsi bhāsvati sāsrāṃ dṛśaṃ cakravākacakravālam /
GK19bahcar6u:58: saṃcarantyāḥ samadhukararavaṃ kairavākaraṃ kalahaṃsaramaṇīramaṇīyaṃ māṇikyakāñjīkiṅkiṇījālamivācakāṇa śriyaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:60: asyāṃ ca velāyāmanatikramaṇīyavacanairupasṛtya pradhānasāmantairvi jñāpyamānaḥ kathaṃ kathamapyabhukta
GK19bahcar6u:61: prabhātāyāṃ ca śarvaryāṃ sarveṣu praviṣṭeṣu rājasu samīpasthitaṃ
GK19bahcar6u:63: śaiśava evāgrāhi guṇavatpatākeva bhavatā tātasya cittavṛttiḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:64: yato bhavantamevaṃ vidhaṃ vidheyaṃ vidhighidhānopanatanairghṛṇyamidaṃ kimapi bibhaṇiṣati me hṛdayam /
GK19bahcar6u:67: śṛṇu, na khalu na jānāsi lokavṛttam /
GK19bahcar6u:68: lokatrayatrātari māndhātari mṛte kiṃ na kṛtaṃ purukutsena?
GK19bahcar6u:71_0: goṣpadīkṛtacaturudanvadante duṣyante vā bharatena? tiṣṭhantu tāvatte tātenaiva śatasamadhikādhigatādhvaradhūmavisaradhūsaritavāsavavayasi
GK19bahcar6u:71_1: sugṛhītanāmni tatrabhavati parāsutāṃ gate pitari kiṃ nākāri rājyam? yaṃ ca kila śokaḥ smabhibhavati taṃ kāpuruṣamācakṣate
GK19bahcar6u:74: svabhāvasya seyaṃ kāpuruṣatā vā straiṇaṃ vā yadevamāspadaṃ pitṛśokahutabhujo jāto 'smi /
GK19bahcar6u:75: mama hi bhūbhṛti paryaste niravaśeṣataḥ prasravaṇānīva srutānyaśrūṇyastamite mahati tejasyandhakārībhūtadaśāśasya
GK19bahcar6u:76: prajñālokaḥ, prajvalitaṃ hṛdayam, ātmadāhabhīta iva svapne 'pi nopasarpati
GK19bahcar6u:77_0: vivekaḥ, balīyasā saṃtāpena jātuṣamiva vilīnamakhilaṃ dhairyam, pade pade digdharopāhateva hariṇī muhyati matiḥ, puruṣadveṣiṇīva
GK19bahcar6u:77_1: dūrata eva bhramati pariharantī spṛtiḥ, ambeva tātenaiva saha gatā dhṛtiḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:82: tāto hutāśanatāmeva kevalāmāpanno 'pi naivaṃ dahati mām /
GK19bahcar6u:83: antastadevamidamasāṃparāyikamiva hṛdayamavaṣṭabhya vyutthitaḥ śokau durnivāro vāḍava iva vārirāśim, paviriva parvatam, kṣaya iva kṣapākaram,
GK19bahcar6u:84: rāhuriva ravim, dahati dārayati tanūkaroti kavalayati ca mām /
GK19bahcar6u:85: kāmaṃ na śaknoti me hṛdayaṃ tādṛśasya samerukalpasya kalpamahāpuruṣasya vinipātamaśrubindubhireva kevalairativāhayitum /
GK19bahcar6u:86: rājye viṣa iva cakorasya me viraktaṃ cakṣuḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:87: bahumṛtapaṭāvaguṇṭhanāṃ rañjitaraṅgāṃ janaṅgamānāmiva vaṃśavāhyāmanāryāṃ śriyaṃ tyaktumabhilaṣati me manaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:88: kṣaṇamapi dagdhagṛhe śakuniriva na pārayāmi thātum /
GK19bahcar6u:89: so 'hamicchāmi manasi vāsasīva sulagnaṃ snehamalamidamamalaiḥ śikhariśikharaprasravaṇaiḥ svacchasro tombubhiḥ prakṣālayitumāśramapade /
GK19bahcar6u:93: ityabhidhāya ca khaḍgagrāhiṇo hastādādāya nijaṃ nistriṃśamutsasarja dharaṇyām /
GK19bahcar6u:94: atha tacchru tvā niśitaśikhena śūlenevāhataḥ pravidīrṇahṛdayo devo harṣaḥ samacintayat--”kiṃ nu khalu māmantareṇāryaḥ kenacidasahiṣṇunā kiñcidgrāhitaḥ kupitaḥ syāt /
GK19bahcar6u:97: āhosvidārya evāyaṃ na bhavati, kiṃ vāryeṇānyadevābhihitamanyaṭevāśrāvi mayā śokaśūnyena śravaṇendriyeṇa /
GK19bahcar6u:102: athavā tātavināśaniḥśaṅkakalikālakrīḍitaṃ yenāyaṃ yaḥ kaścidiva yatkiñcanakāriṇaṃ māmapuṣyabhūtivaṃśasaṃbhūtamiva,
GK19bahcar6u:106: tadetattāvadanurūpaṃ yacchauryonmādamadironmattasamastasāmantamaṇḍalasamudramathanamandare tādṛśi pitari mṛte tapovanaṃ vā gamyate valkalāni vā gṛhyante tapāṃsi vā sevyante /
GK19bahcar6u:107: yā tu mayi rājājñā sā dagdho 'pi dāhakāriṇī mayyavagrahaglapite dhanvanīvāṅgāravṛṣṭiḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:113: brāhnaṇyaḥ, sevakaḥ sukhī, kitavaḥ kṛtajñaḥ, parivrāḍabubhukṣuḥ, nṛśaṃsaḥ
GK19bahcar6u:114: priyavāk, amātyaḥ satyavādīḥ, rājasūnuradurvinītaśca jagati durlabhaḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:116_0: ko hi nāma tadvidhe nipatite rājagandhakuñjare janayitari cedṛśe viphalīkṛtaviśālaśilāstambhorubhuje bhūbhuji bhrātari tyaktarājye
GK19bahcar6u:116_1: jyāyasi navavayasi tapovanaṃ gacchati sakalalokalocanajalapātāpavitraṃ mṛdgolakaṃ vasudhābhidhānaṃ dhanamadakhelanikhilakhalamukhavikāralakṣaṇākhyāyamānanīcācaraṇāṃ
GK19bahcar6u:119: kiṃ vāsya cetasaścyutaḥ saumitrirvismṛtā vā vṛkodaraprabhṛtayaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:121: api cārye tapovanaṃ gate jijīvaṣuḥ ko manasāpi mahīṃ dhyāyet /
GK19bahcar6u:122_1: vanavihārāya vinirgate nivāsa giriguhāṃ kaḥ pāti pṛṣṭhataḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:124: kaścapalāṃ rājalakṣmīṃ pratyanurodho 'yamāryasya yadiyamapi na cīvarāntaritakucā kuśakusumasamitpalāśapūlikāṃ vahantī tatraiva tapovane vanamṛgīva nīyate jarājālinī /
GK19bahcar6u:125: kiṃvā mamānena vṛthā bahudhā bikalpitena tūṣṇīmevāryamanugamiṣyāmi /
GK19bahcar6u:128: atrāntare pūrvādiṣṭenaiva rudatā vastrakarmāntikena samupasthāpiteṣu valkaleṣu, nirdayakaratalatāḍanabhiyeva vkāpi gate hṛdaye, raṭati
GK19bahcar6u:130: pādapraṇatipare phūtkurvati pauravṛnde, vidrāti vidrutacetasi cirantane
GK19bahcar6u:133_0: nivāraṇodyatamanasi, viśati bandhuvarge, nirāśeṣu nakhalikhitamaṇikuṭṭimeṣvavāṅmukhena niḥśvasatsu sāmanteṣu, sabālavṛddhāsu
GK19bahcar6u:133_1: tapovanāya prasthitāsu sarvāsu prajāsu sahasaiva praviśya śokaviklavaḥ prakṣaritanayanasalilo rājyaśriyaḥ paricārakaḥ saṃvādako
GK19bahcar6u:135: atha saṃbhrānto bhrātrā saha svayaṃ devo rājyavardhanastaṃ
GK19bahcar6u:138: sa kathaṃ kathamapyakathayat--”deva! piśācānāmiva nīcātmanāṃ caritāni
GK19bahcar6u:140: yato yasminnahanyavaniṃpatiruparata ityabhūdvārtā tasminneva devo grahavarmā durātmanā mālavarājena jīvalokamātmānaḥ sukṛtena saha tyājitaḥ
GK19bahcar6u:141: bhartṛdārikāpi rājyaśrīḥ kālāyasanigaḍayugalacumbitacaraṇā caurāṅganeva saṃyatā kānyakubje kārāyāṃ nikṣiptā /
GK19bahcar6u:142: kiṃvadantī ca yathā kilānāyakaṃ sādhanaṃ matvā jighṛkṣuḥ sudurmatiretāmapi bhuvamājigamiṣati
GK19bahcar6u:144_1: ca svabhāvasya, darpabahulatayā ca navayauvanasya, vīrakṣetrasaṃbhavatvācca
GK19bahcar6u:145: janmanaḥ, kṛpābhūmibhūtāyāśca svasuḥ snehātsa tādṛśo 'pi baddhamūlo
GK19bahcar6u:147: viveśa ca sahasā kesarīva giriguhāgṛhaṃ gabhīrahṛdayaṃ bhayaṅkaraḥ kopāvegaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:148: keśiniṣūdanaśaṅkākulakāliyabhaṅgurabhrūbhaṅgataraṅgiṇī śyāmāyamānā yamasvaseva prathīyasī lalāṭapaṭṭe bhīṣaṇā bhrukuṭirudabhidyata /
GK19bahcar6u:149: darpātparāmṛśannakhakiraṇasalilanirjharaiḥ samarabhārasaṃbhāvanābhiṣekamiva cakāra diṅnāgakumbhakūṭavikaṭasya bāhuśikharakośasya vāmaḥ pāṇipallavaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:150: saṃgalatsvedasalilapūritodaro nirmūlaṃ mālavonmūlanāya gṛhītakeśa iva durmadaśrīkacagrahotkaṇṭhayeva ca kampamānaḥ punarapi samutsasarpa bhīṣaṇaṃ kṛpāṇaṃ pāṇiraparaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:153: niṣṭhurāṅguṣṭakaṣaṇaniṣṭhyūtadhūtadhūmalekho nirvīrorvīkaraṇāya vimuktaśikha iva lilekha maṇikuṭṭimamitaraḥ pādapajhaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:154: darpasphuṭitasarasavraṇocchalitarudhiracchaṭāvasekaiḥ śokaviṣaprasuptaṃ prabodhayanniva parākramamanujamavādīt--”āyuṣman! idaṃ rājakulam, amī
GK19bahcar6u:158: so 'yaṃ kuraṅgakaiḥ kacagrahaḥ kesariṇaḥ, bhekaiḥ karapātaḥ kāla sarpasya,
GK19bahcar6u:160: dārubhirdāhādeśo dahanasya, timiraistiraskāro raveḥ, yo mālavaiḥ paribhavaḥ puṣyabhūtivaṃśasya
GK19bahcar6u:162: tiṣṭhantu sarva eva rājānaḥ kariṇaśca tvayaiva sārdham /
GK19bahcar6u:165_0: taṃ ca tathā samādiśantamākarṇya jāmijāmātṛvṛttāntavijñānaprakopādhānadūyamāne manasi nirvartanādeśena dūraprarūḍhapraṇayapīḍa
GK19bahcar6u:165_1: iva provāca devo harṣaḥ--”kimiva hi doṣaṃ paśyatyāryo mamānugamanena? yadi bāla iti nitarāṃ tarhi na parityājyo 'smi
GK19bahcar6u:166: rakṣaṇīya iti bhavadbhujapañjaro rakṣāsthānam, aśakta iti vka parīkṣito
GK19bahcar6u:167: 'smi, saṃvardhanīya iti viyogastanūkaroti, akleśasaha iti strīpakṣe
GK19bahcar6u:168: nikṣipto 'smi, sukhamanubhavatviti tvayaiva saha tatprayāti, mahānadhvanaḥ kleśa iti virahāgniviṣahyataraḥ, kalatraṃ rakṣatviti śrīste nistriṃśe
GK19bahcar6u:170: rājakamanadhiṣṭhitamiti tatsubaddhamāryaguṇaiḥ, na bāhyaḥ sahāyo mahata iti vyatiriktameva māṃ gaṇayati, pralaghuparikaraḥ prayāmīti pādarajasi ko
GK19bahcar6u:171: 'tibhāraḥ, dvayorgamanamasāṃpratamiti māmanugṛhāṇa gamanājñayā, kātaro bhrātṛsneha iti sadṛśo doṣaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:172: kā ceyamātmaṃbharitā bhujasya te yadekākī kṣīrodaphenapaṭalapāṇḍuramamṛtamiva yaśaḥ pipāsati
GK19bahcar6u:180: api ca tavāṣṭādaśadvīpāṣṭamaṅgalakamālinī medinyastyeva vikramasya viṣayaḥ
GK19bahcar6u:182: na sumeruvaprapraṇayapragalbhā vā divkariṇaḥ pariṇamantyaṇīyasi valmīke /
GK19bahcar6u:183: grahīṣyasi sakalapṛthvīpatipralayotpātamahādhūmaketuṃ māndhāteva cārucāmīkarapahkapatralatālaṅkārāṅkakāyaṃ kārmukaṃ kakubhāṃ vijaye /
GK19bahcar6u:184: mama tu durnivārāyāmasyāṃ vipakṣakṣapaṇakṣudhi kṣubhitāyāṃ kṣamyatāmayamekākinaḥ kopakavala ekaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:187: atha tathāgate bhrātari, uparate ca pitari, proṣitajīvite ca jāmātari,
GK19bahcar6u:188: mṛtāyāṃ ca mātari, saṃyatāyāṃ ca svasari, svayūthabhraṣṭa iva vanyaḥ karī devo harṣaḥ kathaṃ kathamapyekākī kālaṃ tamanaiṣīt /
GK19bahcar6u:189: atikrānteṣu bahuṣu vāsareṣu kadācittayaiva bhrātṛgamanaduḥkhāsikayā dattaprajāgarasibhāgaśeṣāyāṃ triyāmāyāṃ yāmikena sīyamānāmimāmāryāṃ
GK19bahcar6u:192: potaṃ pavana iva vidhiḥ puruṣamakāṇḍe nipātayati // 6.3 //
GK19bahcar6u:193: tāṃ ca śrutvā sutarāmanityatābhāvanayā dūyamānahṛdayaḥ prakṣīṇabhūyiṣṭhāyāṃ kṣapāyāṃ kṣaṇamiva nidrāmalabhata /
GK19bahcar6u:200: pratyahaṃ rāhuravikalakāyabandha iva kabandhavati bradhnabimbe ghaṭamāno vibhāvyate /
GK19bahcar6u:202: dine dine dāruṇā diśāṃ dāhā dṛśyante /
GK19bahcar6u:205: niśi niśi itastataḥ prajvalitābhirulkābhirugraṃ grahayuddhamiva viyati vilokayanti vilolatārakāḥ kakubhaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:208: asminnasmadvaṃśe kariṇa iva karīraṃ komalamapi kalayataḥ kṛtāntasya kaḥ paripanthī? sarvathā svasti bhavatvāryāya' /
GK19bahcar6u:209: iti cintayitvā ca antarbhinnaṃ bhrātṛsnehakātaraṃ dravadiva hṛdayaṃ kathaṃ kathamapi saṃstabhyotthāya yathākriyamāṇaṃ kriyākalāpamakarot /
GK19bahcar6u:210_0: āsthānagataśca sahasaiva praviśantam, anupraviśatā viṣaṇṇavadanena lokenānugamyamānam, asahyaduḥkhoṣṇaniḥśvāsadhūmaraktatantuneva
GK19bahcar6u:214: dṛṣṭvā ca jātāśaṅkaścakṣuṣi salilena, mukhaśaśini śvasitena, hṛdaye hutāśanena utsaṅge bhuvā, dāruṇāpriyaśravaṇasamaye samamiva sarveṣvaṅgaṣvagṛhyata lokapālaiḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:215: tasmācca helānirjitamālavānīkamapi gauḍādhipena mithyopacāropacitaviśvāsaṃ muktaśastramekākinaṃ viśrabdhaṃ svabhavana eva bhrātaraṃ vyāpāditamaśrauṣīt /
GK19bahcar6u:220: svāvayavairapyadṛṣṭapūrvaprakopabhītairiva kampamānairupetaḥ, hara iva kṛtabhairavākāraḥ, haririva prakaṭitanarasiṃharūpaḥ, sūryakāntaśaila
GK19bahcar6u:222: ivoditadvādaśadinakaradurnirīkṣyamūrtiḥ, mahotpātamāruta iva sakalabhūbhṛtprakampakārī, vindhya iva vardhamānavigrahotsedhaḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:223_0: mahāśīviṣa iva durnarendrābhibhavaropitaḥ, parīkṣita iva sarvabhogidahanodyataḥ vṛkodara iva ripurudhiratṛṣitaḥ, suragaja
GK19bahcar6u:223_1: iva pratipakṣavāraṇapradhāvitaḥ, pūrvāgama iva pauruṣasya, unmāda iva madasya,
GK19bahcar6u:224: āvega ivāvalepasya, tāruṇyāvatāra iva tejasaḥ, sarvodyoga iva darpasya,
GK19bahcar6u:225: yugāgama iva yauvanoṣmaṇaḥ, rājyābhiṣeka iva raṇarasasya, nīrājanadivasa ivāsahiṣṇutāyāḥ parāṃ bhīṣaṇatāmayāsīt /
GK19bahcar6u:226_0: avādīcca gauḍādhipādhamamapahāya kastādṛśaṃ mahāpuruṣa tatkṣaṇa ve nirvyājabhūjavīryanirjitasamastarājakaṃ muktaśastraṃ kalaśayonimiva
GK19bahcar6u:226_1: kṛṣṇavartmaprasūtirīdṛśena sarvavīralokavimarditena mṛtyunā śamayedevamāryam anāryaṃ ca taṃ muktvā bhāgīrathīphenapaṭalapāṇḍurāḥ
GK19bahcar6u:226_2: keṣāṃ manaḥsu saraḥsu rājahaṃsā iva paraśurāmaparākramasmṛtikṛto na kuryurāryaśauryagṛṇāḥ pakṣapātam /
GK19bahcar6u:228: kāṃ nu gatiṃ gamiṣyati, kāṃ vā yoniṃ pravekṣyati, kasminvā narake nipatiṣyati /
GK19bahcar6u:230: nāmāpi ca gṛhṇato 'sya pāpakāriṇaḥ pāpamalena lipyata iva me jihvā /
GK19bahcar6u:231: kiṃ vāṅgīkṛtya kāryamāryastena kṣudreṇānupraviśya vigataghṛṇena ghuṇeneva sakalabhuvanāhlādanacaturaścandanastambhaḥ kṣayamupanītaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:232: nūnaṃ nānena mūḍhena madhurasāsvādalubdhena madhvivāryajīvitamākarṣatā bhāvī dṛṣṭaḥ śilīmukhasaṃpātopadravaḥ
GK19bahcar6u:233: nijagṛhadūṣaṇaṃ jālamārgapradīpakena kajjalamivātimalinaṃ kevalamayaśaḥ saṃcitaṃ gauḍādhamena
GK19bahcar6u:234: ntavāśvevāstamupagatavatyapi tribhuvanacūḍāmaṇau savitari vedhasādiṣṭaḥ satpathaśatrorandhakārasya nigrahāya grahaṣaṇḍavihāraikahariṇādhipaḥ śaśī /
GK19bahcar6u:235: vinayavidhāyini bhagne 'pi cāṅkuśe vidyata eva vyālavāraṇasya vinayāya sakalamattamātaṅgakumbhasthalasthiraśirobhāgabhiduraḥ khalataraḥ kesarinakharaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:236: tādṛśāḥ kuvaikaṭikā iva tejasviratnavināśakāḥ kasya na vadhyāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:237_0: kvedānīṃ yāsyati dubundbhiḥ?' ityevamabhidadhata evāsya piturapi mitraṃ senāpatiḥ samagravigrahaprāgraharo haritālaśailāvadātadehaḥ
GK19bahcar6u:237_1: pariṇatapraguṇasālaprakāṇḍaprakāśaḥ prāṃśuḥ, atiśauryoṣmaṇeva paripākamāgato gatabhūyiṣṭhe vayasi vartamānaḥ, bahuśaraśayanasuptotthito
GK19bahcar6u:238_0: 'pi hasanniva śāntanavamatidīrghaṇāyuṣā, durabhibhavaśarīratayā jarayāpi bhītabhītayeva prakaṭitaprakampayā parāmṛṣṭaḥ, kathamapi
GK19bahcar6u:242: mukhena, mṛtamapi hṛdayasthitaṃ svāminamiva sitacāmareṇa vījayannābhilambena kūrcakalāpena, pariṇāme 'pi
GK19bahcar6u:253: araṇiramarṣāgneḥ, aiśvaryaṃ śauryasya, visarpo darpasya, hṛdayaṃ haṭhasya,
GK19bahcar6u:256: tulā śauyaśālinām, sīmāntadṛśvā śastragrāmasya, nirvoḍhā prauḍhavādānām,
GK19bahcar6u:257: saṃstambhayitā bhagnānām, pāragaḥ pratijñāyāḥ, marmajño mahāvigrahāṇām,
GK19bahcar6u:258: āghoṣaṇāpaṭahaḥ samarārthinām, saṃnidhāvevasamupaviṣṭaḥ siṃhanādanāmā svareṇaiva dundubhighoṣagambhīreṇa
GK19bahcar6u:260: “deva! na vkacitkṛtāśrayayā malinayā malinatarāḥ kokilayā kākā iva kāpuruṣā hatalakṣmyā vipralabhyamānamātmānaṃ na cetayante /
GK19bahcar6u:261: śriyo hi doṣā andhatādayaḥ kāmalā vikārāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:263: kiṃ vā karotu varākaḥ yanātibhīrutayā nityaparāṅmukhena natu dṛṣṭānyeva sarvātiśāyiśauryātiśayaśvayathukapilakapolapulakapallavitakopānalāni kupitānāṃ tejasvināṃ mukhāni /
GK19bahcar6u:264: nāsau tapasvī jānātyevaṃ yathābhicārā iva viprakṛtāḥ sadyaḥ sakalakulapralayamupāharanti manasvina iti /
GK19bahcar6u:267: manasvināṃ hi pradhanapradhānadhane dhanuṣi dhriyamāṇe sati ca kamalākalahaṃsīkelikuvalayakānane kṛpāṇe kṛpaṇopāyāḥ payodhimathanaprabhṛtayo 'pi śrīmamatthānasya kiṃ punarīdṛśāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:268_0: yeṣāṃ ca dhātrā dharitrīṃ trātuṃ niyuktāḥ svayamasamarthā iva kulaśakarkaśabhujaparighapraharaṇahetorudgiranti girayo 'pi
GK19bahcar6u:268_1: lohāni te kathamiva bāhuśālino manasāpi vimalayaśobhāndhavā dhyāyeyurakāryam sarvagrahābhibhavabhāsvarāṇāṃ hi subhaṭakarāṇāmagrato
GK19bahcar6u:269: mahāmahiṣaśṛṅgataraṅgabhaṅgabhahgurabhīṣaṇāntarālā lokapravādamātreṇa ca dakṣiṇāśā paramārthato bhaṭamrukuṭiradhivāso yamasya /
GK19bahcar6u:270: citraṃ ca yadunmuktasiṃhanādānāṃ sahasā sāhasarabhasarasaromāñcakaṇṭakanikareṇa saha na niryānti saṭāḥ śūrāṇāṃ raṇeṣu /
GK19bahcar6u:271: dvayameva ca catuḥsāgarasaṃbhṛtasya bhūtisaṃbhārasya bājanaṃ pratipakṣadāhi dāruṇaṃ vaḍavāmukhaṃ vā mahāpuruṣahṛdayaṃ vā /
GK19bahcar6u:273: vṛthāvitatavipulaphaṇābhāro bhujahgānāṃ bhartā bibharti yo bhogena mṛtpiṇḍameva kevalam /
GK19bahcar6u:274: apratihataśāsanākrāntyupabhogasukharasaṃ tu rasāyāṃ dikkuñjarabhārabhāsvaraprakoṣṭhā vīrabāhava eva jānanti /
GK19bahcar6u:276: kātarasya tu śaśina iva hariṇahṛdayasya pāṇḍurapṛṣṭhasya suto dvirātramapi niścalā lakṣmīḥ
GK19bahcar6u:285: kavaciṣu ripūraḥkavāṭeṣu pātyamānāḥ, pāvakaśikhāmiva śriyamapi vamanti
GK19bahcar6u:287_0: yaschāhitahatasvajano manasvijano dviṣadyoṣidurastāḍanena kathayati hṛdayaduḥkham paruṣāsilatānipātapavanenocchvasiti nirucchvasitaśatrudhārāpātena
GK19bahcar6u:287_1: roditi vipakṣavanitācakṣuṣā dadāti jalaṃ sa śreyānnetaraḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:288: na ca svapnadṛṣṭanaṣṭeṣviva kṣaṇikeṣu śarīreṣu nibadhnanti bandhubuddhiṃ prabuddhāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:290: anavarataprajvalitatejaḥprasarabhāsvarasvabhāvaṃ ca maṇipradopamiva kaluṣaḥ kajjalamalo na spṛśatyevātitejasvinaṃ śokaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:291: satvaṃ sattvavatāmagraṇīḥ prāgraharaḥ prājñānāṃ prathamaḥ samarthānāṃ praṣṭho 'bhijātānāmagresarastejasvināmādirasahiṣṇūnām
GK19bahcar6u:292: etāśca satatasaṃnihitadhūmāyamānakopāgnayaḥ sulabhāsidhārātoyatṛptayo vikaṭabāhuvanacchāyopagūḍhā dhīratāyā nivāsaśiśirabhūmayaḥ svāyattāḥ subhaṭānāmuraḥkavāṭabhittayaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:294: tathā kuru yathā nānyo 'pi kaścidācaratyevaṃ bhūyaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:306: yenaiva ca te gataḥ pitā pitāmahaḥ prapitāmaho vā tameva mā hāsīstribhuvanaspṛhaṇīyaṃ panthānam
GK19bahcar6u:307: avahāya kupuruṣocitāṃ śucaṃ pratipadyasva kulakramāgatāṃ kesarīva kuraṅgīṃ rājalakṣmīm /
GK19bahcar6u:308: deva! devabhūyaṃ gate narendre duṣṭagauḍabhujaṅgajagdhajīvite ca rājyavardhane vṛtte 'sminmahāpralaye dharaṇīdhāraṇāyādhunā tvaṃ śeṣaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:310: kṣmāpatīnāṃ śiraḥsu śaratsaviteva lalāṭantapān prayaccha pādanyāsān /
GK19bahcar6u:312_0: api ca hate pitaryekākī tapasvī mṛgaiḥ saha saṃvardhitaḥ sahajabrāhnaṇyamārdavasukumāramanāḥ kṛtaniścayacaṇḍacāpavanāṭaniṭāṅkāranādanirmadīkṛtadiggajaṃ
GK19bahcar6u:312_1: guñjajjyājālajanitajagajjvaraṃ samagramudyatamekaviṃśatikṛtvaḥ kṛtavaṃśamutkhātavān rājanyakaṃ paraśurāmaḥ, kiṃ punarnaisargikakāyakārkaśyakuliśāyamānamānaso
GK19bahcar6u:314: na hyayamarātiraktacandanacarcāśiśiropacāramantareṇa sāmyati paribhavānalapacyamānadehasya devasya duḥkhadāhajvara sudāruṇaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:321: itarathā hi me gṛhītabhuvi bhogināthe 'pi dāyādadṛṣṭirīrṣyālorbhujasya /
GK19bahcar6u:323: upari gacchatīcchati nigrahāya grahagaṇe 'pi bhrūlatā calitum /
GK19bahcar6u:328: kiṃ punarīdṛśe durjāte jāte jātāmarṣanirbhare ca manasi nāstyevāvakāśaḥ sokakriyākaraṇasya? api ca hṛdayaviṣamaśalye musalye jīvati jālme
GK19bahcar6u:329: jagadvigahite gauḍādhipādhamacaṇḍāle jihremi śuṣkādharapuṭaḥ pījeva pratikāraśūnyaṃ śucā śūtkartum
GK19bahcar6u:335: sakalacāpacāpaladurlalitanarapaticaraṇaraṇaraṇāyamānanigaḍāṃ nirgauḍaṃ gāṃ na karomi tatastanūnapāti pītasarpiṣi pataṅga iva pātakī pātayāmyātmānam'
GK19bahcar6u:340: sarveṣāṃ rājñāṃ sajjīkriyantāṃ karāḥ karadānāya śastragrahaṇāya vā,
GK19bahcar6u:341: gṛhyantāṃ diśaścāmarāṇi vā, namantu śirāṃsi dhanūṃṣi vā,
GK19bahcar6u:342: karṇapūrīkriyantāmājñā maurvyo vā, śekharībhavantu pādarajāṃsi śirastrāṇi
GK19bahcar6u:343: vā, ghaṭantāmañjalayaḥ karighaṭābandhā vā, mucyantāṃ bhūmaya iṣavo vā,
GK19bahcar6u:344: samālambyantāṃ vetrayaṣṭayaḥ kuntayaṣṭayo vā, sudṛṣṭaḥ kriyatāmātmā maccaraṇanakheṣu kṛpāṇadarpaṃṇeṣu vā /
GK19bahcar6u:346: paṅgoriva mekuto nivṛttistāvadyāvanna kṛtaḥ sarvadvīpāntarasaṃcārī sakalanarapatimukuṭamaṇiśilālokamayaḥ pādalepaḥ' /
GK19bahcar6u:347: iti kṛtaniścayaśca muktāsthāno visarjitarājalokaḥ snānārambhākāṅkṣī sabhāmatyākṣīt /
GK19bahcar6u:349: agalacca darpaprasara iva śrutapratijñasya śāmyadūṣmā divasastribhuvanasya
GK19bahcar6u:350: tataśca nijādhikārāpahārabhīta iva bhagavatyapi vkāpi gate
GK19bahcar6u:352: saṃkucatsu, vihagagaṇeṣvapi samupasaṃhṛtanijapakṣavikṣepaniścaleṣu bhiyevāprakaṭībhavatsu, bhuvanavyāpinīṃ sandhyāṃ pratijñāmiva mānayati nataśirasi ghaṭitāñjalivane jane sakale,
GK19bahcar6u:353: svapadacyuticakitadikpāladīyamānābhralihalohaprākāravalayakalitāsvi va bahalatimiramālātiraudhīyamānāsu dikṣu pradoṣāsthāne nāticiraṃ tasthau /
GK19bahcar6u:354: namannṛpalokalolāṃśukapavanakampitaśikhairdīpikācakravālairapi praṇamyamāna iva prāhiṇollokaṃ pratiṣiddhaparijanapraveśaśca śayanagṛhaṃ prāviśat /
GK19bahcar6u:356: dīpadvitīyaṃ ca tamabhisara iva labdhāvasarastarasā bhrātṛśoko jagrāha /
GK19bahcar6u:363: kathaṃ cāsya me hatahṛdayasyāryavirahe sakṛdapi yuktaṃ samacchvasitum /
GK19bahcar6u:368: dagdharoṣāntaritaśucā suciraṃ ruditamapi na muktakaṇṭhaṃ gataghṛṇena mayā
GK19bahcar6u:370: lokayātrāmātranibandhanā bāndhavatā yatrāhamapi nāma para ivārye svargasthe svastha ivāse
GK19bahcar6u:371: daivahatakena phalamāsāditamīdṛśi parasparaprītibandhanirvṛtahṛdaye sukhabhāji bhrātṛmithune vighaṭite /
GK19bahcar6u:372: tathā ca candramayā iva jagadāhlādino lokāntarībhūtasya lagnacitāgnaya ivāryasya ta eva dahanti guṇāḥ ityetāni cānyāni ca hṛdayena paryadevata /
GK19bahcar6u:373: prabhātāyāṃ ca śarvaryāṃ pratīhāramādideśāśeṣagajasādhanādhikṛtaṃ skandaguptaṃ draṣṭumicchāmīti
GK19bahcar6u:392_0: pādanyāsairgurubhāragrahaṇagarvamurvyāḥ saṃharanniva, gativaśavilolasya cājānulambasya bāhudaṇḍadvayasya vikṣepairālānaśilāstambhamālāmivobhayato
GK19bahcar6u:394: dadhānaḥ, atisnigdhamadhuradhavalaviśālatayā pītakṣīrodeneva pibannīkṣaṇayugmāyāmena diśāmāyāmaṃ merutaṭādapi vikaṭavipulālikaḥ,
GK19bahcar6u:398_0: 'pyaspṛṣṭo madena bhūtimānapi snehamayaḥ pārthivo 'pi guṇamayaḥ kariṇāmiva dānavatāmupari sthitaḥ, svāmitāmiva spṛhaṇīyāṃ
GK19bahcar6u:399: vidagdhānām, abhṛtabhṛtyo bhajatām, akrītadāso viduṣām, skandagupto viveśa rājakulam /
GK19bahcar6u:401: upaviṣṭaṃ ca nātinikaṭe taṃ tadā jagāda devo harṣaḥ--
GK19bahcar6u:405: ityevamabhihitaśca pramamya vyajñāpayat--”kṛtamavadhārayatu svāmī samādiṣṭaṃ kitu svalpaṃ vijñapyamasti bhartṛbhakteḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:407: devena hi puṣyabhūtivaṃśasaṃbhūtasyābhijanasyābijātyasya sahajasya tejasodikkarikarapralambasya bāhuyugalasyāsādhāraṇasya ca sodarasnehasya sarvaṃ sadṛśamupakrāntam /
GK19bahcar6u:408: kākodarābidhānāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ kṛmayo 'pi na mṛṣyanti nikāraṃ kimuta bhavādṛśāstejasāṃ rāśayaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:409: kevalaṃ devarājyavardhanodantena kiyadapi dṛṣṭameva devena durjanadaurātmyam /
GK19bahcar6u:410: ridṛśāḥ khalu lokasvabhāvāḥ pratigrāmaṃ pratinagaraṃ pratideśaṃ pratidvīpaṃ pratidiśaṃ ca bhinnā veśāścākārāścāhārāśca vyāhārāśca vyavahārāśca janapadānām /
GK19bahcar6u:416: cūḍāmaṇilagnalekhapratibimbavācitākṣarā ca cārucāmokaracāmaragrāhiṇī yamatāṃ yayau yavaneśvarasya
GK19bahcar6u:417: lobhabahulaṃ ca bahulaniśi nidhānamutkhanantamutkhātakhaḍgapramāthinī mamantha māthuraṃ bṛhadrathaṃ vidūrathavarūthinī /
GK19bahcar6u:418: nāgavanavihāraśīlaṃ ca māyāmātaṅgāṅgānnirgatā mahāsenasainikā vatsapatiṃ nyayaṃsiṣuḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:419: atidayitalāsyasya ca śailūṣamadyamadhyāsya mūrdhānamasilatayā mṛṇālamivālunādagnimitrātmajasya sumitrasya mitradevaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:421: prajñādurbalaṃ ca baladarśanavyapadeśadarśitāśeṣasainyaḥ, senānīranāryo mauryaṃ bṛhadrathaṃ pipeṣa puṣyamitraḥ svāminam /
GK19bahcar6u:422: āścaryakutūhalī ca daṇḍopanatayavananirmitena nabhastalayāyinā yantrayānenānīyata vkāpi kākavarṇaḥ śaiśunāgiśca nagaropakaṇṭhe kaṇṭhe nicakṛte nistriṃśena /
GK19bahcar6u:423: atistrīsaṅgaratamanaṅgaparavasaṃ śuṅgamamātyo vasudevo devabhūtidāsīduhitrā devīvyañjanayā vītajīvitamakārayat /
GK19bahcar6u:426: mahākālamahe ca manāmāṃsavikrayavādavātūlaṃ vetālastālajaṅgho jaghāna jaghanyajaṃ pradyotasya pauṇakiṃ kumāraṃ kumārasenam /
GK19bahcar6u:428: strīviśvāsinasca mahādevīgṛhagūḍhabhittibhāgbhūtvā bhrātā bhadrasenasyābhavanmṛtyave kāliṅgasya vīrasenaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:430: utsārakaruciṃ carahasi sasacivameva dūrīcakāra cakoranāthaṃ śūdrakadūtaścandraketuṃ jīvitāt
GK19bahcar6u:431: mṛgayāsaktasya ca mathnato gaṇḍakānuddaṇḍanaḍvalanalavananilīnāsca campādhipacamūcarabhaṭāscāmuṇḍīpaterācemuḥ prāṇān puṣkarasya /
GK19bahcar6u:432: bandirāgaparaṃ ca paraprayuktā jayaśabdamukharamukhā maṅkhā maukhariṃ mūrkhaṃ kṣatravarmāṇamudakhanan
GK19bahcar6u:433: aripure ca parakalatrakāmukaṃ kāminīveśaguptaśca candraguptaḥ śakapatimaśātayaditi /
GK19bahcar6u:434: pramattānāṃ ca pramadākṛtā api pramādāḥ śrutiviṣayamāgatā eva devasya /
GK19bahcar6u:435: yathā madhumoditaṃ madhurakasaṃliptairlājaiḥ suprabhā putrarājyārthaṃ mahāsena kāśirājaṃ jaghāna
GK19bahcar6u:436_0: vyājajanitakandarpadarpā ca darpaṇena kṣuradhārāparyantenāyodhyādhipatiṃ parantapaṃ ratnavatī jārūthyam, viṣacūrṇacumbitamakarandena
GK19bahcar6u:436_1: ca karṇendīvareṇa devakī devarānuruktā devasenaṃ sauhnyam,
GK19bahcar6u:437: yogaparāgavirasavarṣiṇā ca maṇinūpureṇa vallabhā sapatnīruṣā vairantyaṃ
GK19bahcar6u:438: rantidevam, veṇīvinigūḍhena ca śastreṇa bindumatīṃ vṛṣṇiṃ vindūratham,
GK19bahcar6u:439: rasadigdhamadyena ca mekhalāmaṇinā hasavatī sauvīraṃ vorasenam,
GK19bahcar6u:440: adṛśyāgadaviliptavadanā ca viṣavāruṇīgaṇḍūṣapāyanena pauravī pauraveśvaraṃ somakam' /
GK19bahcar6u:443: tataśca tathā kṛtapratijñe prayāṇaṃ vijayāya diśāṃ samādiśati deve harṣe gatāyuṣāṃ pratisāmantānāmudavasiteṣu bahurūpāṇyupaliṅgāni vitenire /
GK19bahcar6u:446: ciraṃ vivṛtavikṛtavadanaviva raviniḥsṛtavahnivisarā vāsare 'pi virasaṃ viresuściramaśivārthamaśivāḥ śivāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:455: samāghrātayamamahiṣagandhā iva tāmyantaḥ stambakarimapi harayo haritaṃ navayavasaṃ na ceruḥ
GK19bahcar6u:462: vadhyālaṅkāraraktacandanarasacchaṭā ivālakṣyanta śūrāṇāṃ patitāḥ śarīreṣu vikasitabandhūkakusumaśoṇitaśociṣaḥ śoṇitavṛṣṭayaḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:463: paryagnīkurvāṇā iva vinaśvarīṃ śriyamaviralasphuratsphuliṅgāhgārodgāradagdhatārāgaṇā gaṇaśaḥ patantaḥ prajvalanto na vyaraṃsiṣurulkādaṇḍāḥ /
GK19bahcar6u:464: prathamameva pratihārīvāpaharantī pratibhavanaṃ cāmarātapatravyajanāni paruṣā babhrāma vātyeti
GK19bahcar6u:465: iti śrībāṇamaṭṭakṛtau harṣacarite rājapratijñāvarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭha
